attributes.action: help England fans watch England, playing international football for free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please help stop the British pulic being forced to pay to watch England international football games. Most of us do not have SKY etc. and many people wont be able to, or can't get the games online ie; elderly people who love watching football.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
